HediffDef.label: fortress
HediffDef.description: This super used the super durability specialization ability to become almost immune to damage temporarily.

HediffDef.label: beelzebub
HediffDef.description: This pawn is absorbing nutrients from every source in the area that in can reach, from the living things that naturally store nutrition all the way down to the nutrients in the soil that plants utilize.

HediffDef.label: beelzebub target
HediffDef.description: A nearby gluttonous pawn is draining this being's strength. This being should try to get away from the gluttonous super to avoid losing all of its food reserves.

HediffDef.label: regenerating
HediffDef.description: This super used the super healing specialization ability to increase their regeneration considerably temporarily.

HediffDef.label: portent
HediffDef.description: This super is focusing their senses to such an extent that they can deflect most attacks. As the ability wears off, the effects will gradually become weaker. Once this ability has worn off, their perception pool will be drained for around 10 days, reducing the benefits the pawn would receive from both the base Superhero gene and Super Perception(or what the ability provided by Super Perception would give while active, if you're using activatables).

HediffDef.label: recovering from hacking
HediffDef.description: After hacking a mechanoid, this pawn needs some time to recover. Their body will lie comatose for around 4 days.

HediffDef.label: beguile
HediffDef.description: This super has drained their persuasion pool for around 10 days, reducing the benefits the pawn would receive from both the base Superhero gene and Super Persuasion(or what the ability provided by Super Persuasion would give while active, if you're using activatables).

HediffDef.label: snapshot
HediffDef.description: This super used the super precision specialization ability to increase their accuracy and shooting speed temporarily.

HediffDef.label: sprinter
HediffDef.description: This super's body is moving at speeds unmatched by even archotech machines, but once it wears off this pawn will need some time to recover. Their body will lie comatose for around 10 days.

HediffDef.label: titan strength
HediffDef.description: This super used the super strength specialization ability to increase their melee damage to unbelievable heights temporarily.
